channel.title: | DebianScape | Custom Client | Staff Positions |
channel.description:
[i]My other topic was deleted due to putting up my website link. Removed the link. :)[/i] I started this server in early may, and worked on it for quite some time. I then halted for about 2 months, before I started up work on it again. Bellow are some staff positions that are available. Website links will be available once a mod says I can post them. :p Multi-GameFrame Client Admins (2/2) Jimbomac, cupid Mods (0/4) Developer (0/3) super mod (0/2) Features I have Implemented: - God wars (under construction) - Working Godswords - Most minigames - Vesta's and Statius - Added shops - Donator System - Server Notice - Points system Please fill the Form bellow which you wish to apply:
Programming Experience: (Rate yourself 1-2) Maturity Leve:l 1-10 Work you have done: *Evidence
*[i]For developers. Work such as websites, and projects.[/i] Pictures: [IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa433/EnVy_AsTrO/debian2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa433/EnVy_AsTrO/debian3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa433/EnVy_AsTrO/debian1.png[/img]

item.description:
@123blademan1 wrote:

My other topic was deleted due to putting up my website link. Removed the link.

I started this server in early may, and worked on it for quite some time. I then halted for about 2 months, before I started up work on it again. Bellow are some staff positions that are available. Website links will be available once a mod says I can post them.

Multi-GameFrame Client

Admins (2/2) Jimbomac, cupid
Mods (0/4)
Developer (0/3)
super mod (0/2)

Features I have Implemented:

  • God wars (under construction)

  • Working Godswords

  • Most minigames

  • Vesta’s and Statius

  • Added shops

  • Donator System

  • Server Notice

  • Points system

Please fill the Form bellow which you wish to apply:

Programming Experience: (Rate yourself 1-2) Maturity Leve:l 1-10 Work you have done: *Evidence

*For developers. Work such as websites, and projects.
